>
[Improved Poison Weapon](/Feats.aspx?ID=4951) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=687" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 173 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetypes** [Assassin](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=48) (Level 10), [Poisoner](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=71) (Level 10), [Assassin](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=239) (Level 10), [Poisoner](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=259) (Level 10)

**Prerequisites**
[Poison Weapon](/Feats.aspx?ID=4933)

</column>

---

You deliver poisons in ways that maximize their harmful effects. When you apply a simple poison with Poison Weapon, the poison deals 2d4 poison damage instead of 1d4 poison damage. You don’t waste a poison you apply with Poison Weapon on a critically failed attack roll.
